sentences.en: An examination done on swabs from ulcers or smears from tissue biopsies that can be carried out rapidly at local health facilities where TB microscopy is also done.
sentences.cn: 对溃疡拭子或来自组织切片的涂片所做的一种检查，可在同时进行结核显微镜检查的地方卫生设施中快速进行。

sentences.en: Borax carmine A dye used to stain nuclei for light microscopy.
sentences.cn: 硼砂洋红:一种用来在光学显微镜下染细胞核的染料.

sentences.en: Demonstration of rhomboid protogranules by electron microscopy is diagnostic.
sentences.cn: 电镜下可见瘤细胞胞浆有明显的球旁细胞的菱形颗粒.

sentences.en: Electron microscopy has revolutionized the study of crystal imperfections.
sentences.cn: 电子显微学已经革新了对晶体不完整性的研究.

sentences.en: Good compatibility between PVA and starch was observed by scanning electron microscopy.
sentences.cn: 扫描电镜测试证实了PVA与 淀粉具有良好的相容性.

sentences.en: Light microscopy has also been useful in studies on the secondary wall of the cotton fiber.
sentences.cn: 光学显微镜还可以用来研究棉纤维的次生层.

sentences.en: Low power microscopy illustrates the multilocular cysts separated by fibrous tissue.
sentences.cn: 低倍镜显示纤维组织分隔的多房囊腔.

sentences.en: Methods: Immunofluorescence , immunochemistry, electron microscopy and in situ hybridization were used.
sentences.cn: 方法: 间接免疫荧光、免疫组化 、 透射电镜和原位杂交.

sentences.en: Methods: The intramural lymphatics of rectum in rats light and electron microscopy.
sentences.cn: 方法用半薄、超薄切片、光镜和电镜下观察大鼠淋巴管的微细分布.

sentences.en: Monochromator is a very important part in living cell fluorescence microscopy system.
sentences.cn: 单色激发光源是单细胞荧光显微系统中的重要组成部分.

sentences.en: Not only might it have applications in fields such as microscopy, but it apparently also has the ability to optically store data forever.
sentences.cn: 它不仅可以在诸如显微镜之类的领域得到应用，显然它同时也具有实现永久性光存储的能力。

sentences.en: Side - by - side comparison of LCTF and AOTF in fluorescence microscopy was made.
sentences.cn: 声光调变 式 滤光片和液晶调变式滤光片在萤光显微镜学方面的应用做了比较.

sentences.en: The electron dense deposits electron microscopy at high magnification are seen here.
sentences.cn: 图示电子显微镜高倍视野下的高电子密度沉积物.

sentences.en: The sample wasandwas characterized by X - ray diffraction and scanning electron microscopy ( SEM ) .
sentences.cn: 样品经X - 射线衍射和扫描 电子显微镜 测定,并探讨了反应机理.

sentences.en: These and other questions may be solved only by microscopy.
sentences.cn: 这些问题及其它问题,只有通过显微镜研究才能获得解决.

sentences.en: These features are examined by optical microscopy, scanning electron microscopy, and transmission electron microscopy.
sentences.cn: 这些图形可以用光学显微镜, 扫描电子显微镜和透射电子显微镜来观察.

sentences.en: Under electron microscopy, granular siderosomes are present within cytoplasm.
sentences.cn: 电子显微镜下见色素颗粒堆积于细胞质内.
